description: Nate Silver looks at how the 20 best defenses and 20 best offenses to play in the Super Bowl fared in the game and what their records say about this yearâ€™s matchup.
title: The Best Defense Is a Good Defense
title_page: The Best Defense Is a Good Defense - The New York Times
text:
This is an archive of posts from FiveThirtyEight, a blog founded by Nate Silver in 2008 and devoted to rigorous, data-driven analysis of politics, polling, public affairs, sports, economics, science and culture, from August 2010 through July 2013.
Current FiveThirtyEight content can be found at www.fivethirtyeight.com.
